name: Create the msg.template to use
template:
<canvas id="bubble-chart" width="1" height="1"></canvas>

<script>
new Chart(document.getElementById("bubble-chart"), {
    type: 'bubble',
    data: {
      labels: "label",
      datasets: [
        {
          label: "{{{payload.legend1}}}",
          backgroundColor: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3000)",
          borderColor: "rgba(255,255,255,0.3000)",
          data: [
            {{{payload.data1}}}
          ]
        },
        {
          label: "{{{payload.legend2}}}",
          backgroundColor: "rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.3000)",
          borderColor: "rgba(255,0,0,0.3000)",
          data: [
            {{{payload.data2}}}
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    options: {
        animation: false,
        legend: {
            display: true,
            labels: {
                fontColor: 'rgb(255, 255, 255)'
            }
        },
    title: {
        display: true,
        text: '{{{payload.title}}}',
        fontColor: 'rgb(255, 255, 255)'
      }, scales: {
        yAxes: [{ 
            ticks: {
                min: -2.5, // minimum value
                max: 2.5 // maximum value
            },
          scaleLabel: {
            display: true,
            labelString: "Y [m]",
            fontColor: 'rgb(255, 255, 255)'
          }
        }],
        xAxes: [{ 
            ticks: {
                min: -2.5, // minimum value
                max: 2.5 // maximum value
            },
          scaleLabel: {
            display: true,
            labelString: "X [m]",
            fontColor: 'rgb(255, 255, 255)'
          }
        }]
      }
    }
});

</script>
